author: wsomentors
title: Webinar: VC Q&A - fundraising & startup operations/management -- 1pm ET, 9/10/15
text:
Mark Peter Davis, Managing Partner | Interplay Ventures Mark Peter Davis is a venture capitalist, serial entrepreneur, author and community organizer. 
MPD is the Founder of Interplay Ventures an investment and incubation firm based in NYC. At Interplay he oversees the investment operations and decisions and is the cofounder of more than a dozen companies. 
MPD is the author of The Fundraising Rules, a handbook designed to help entrepreneurs raise capital that illuminates the architecture of the venture capital business. He is also the founder of both the Columbia Venture Community and the New York Venture Community. Mark also serves as a mentor to numerous accelerators in NYC. 
Prior to his current ventures, MPD was a venture capitalist at DFJ Gotham Ventures (now Gotham Ventures) and then Primary Ventures, where he not only made investments but helped to optimize each firm's operations. Before entering VC, he was a M&A advisor to Fortune 1000 acquirers at KPMG and a strategy and operations consultant at Bain & Company . 
MPD earned his B.A. from Duke University and his M.B.A. from Columbia Business School. 
You can follow his blog at mpd.me and his tweets at @mpd. 
If you missed the webinar, it will be available on the homepage in exactly 1 month, for 24 hours October 10, 2015 before going into the WSO Video Library. WALL STREET MENTORS 
Interested in one-on-one personalized help from a WSO Mentor? Professionals in investment banking, private equity, hedge funds, sales & trading , management consulting , corporate finance and more are ready to help you with mock interviews , career consultations and detailed industry advice this week. Order 1 hour, 3 hour or 5 hour packages. To learn more about the Wall Street Mentors program, please click the Learn More button below: LEARN MORE WSO VIDEO LIBRARY - ALL WEBINARS + MORE 
Below is a list of some of the webinars we currently have in the WSO Video Library...this is in addition to actual mock interviews and Q&As videos from some of our top mentors... with more on the way every week! Investment Banking + Sales & Trading Webinars Transitioning from Investment Banking to Private Equity Banking Fit Interviews 3 Secrets to Breaking into S&T Leveraged Loans Market Mastering the Sales & Trading Interview Fixed Income Sales and Trading - Products and Markets - July Breaking in / Working in S&T - September IPO's: How they are sold, how they are valued and why they usually go up Best Practices for Technical Interviews transaction advisory Working for a middle market investment bank How to decide between whether IB or S&T is right for you My Experience as an Analyst at Goldman Sachs Non-Target School to BB IB Career switching - going from engineering to banking - my story Technical Interview Prep Recruiting for IB in Germany MBA and your IB / PE Career IB in India: Recruiting, lateraling, networking, and foreigners working in India Surviving a summer IBD internship and how to go about treating return offers How a Middle Market M&A Process Works and a Junior Banker's Role Deciding between S&T, I Banking and Capital Markets + Who is capital markets right for? Mid Market PE & M&A in Toronto/Canada Former Goldman intern program manager discusses how to make the most of your summer internship + more! Private Equity & Venture Capital Webinars PE Recruiting & Transition to PE Webinar Growth Equity Investing Webinar Lessons from My Path: Consulting to MM Private Equity 6/19 How the PE investment process works and how to make a PE investment case - July Getting the VC Job - July PE Success Story from a Low GPA , Non-Target Engineering Major - Mid July Week in the Life of an Investment Director at a Growth Equity PE Firm - August Sources of Value Creation in Private Equity." - August Starting your own PE firm: structuring deals and building a business as an independent sponsor - September How to speak about your IB deals in a PE interview setting Week in the Life of a Private Equity Analyst Recruiting into a growth equity fund from a background in merchant banking and equity research + the current investing environment within growth equity Mid Market PE & M&A in Toronto/Canada + more!
